title: Troopers: Teen in Wasilla dies of gunshot wound
content:
Alaska State Troopers in Wasilla say a 16-year-old boy has died as the result of a gunshot wound.
Troopers responded to a call Monday, shortly after midnight, from a home in the Mat-Su community. It was reported the teenager had sustained a gunshot wound.
"Troopers and (medics) responded and the juvenile was airlifted to (a hospital) where he was later pronounced deceased," the dispatch says.
Troopers say the boy's family has been told about the death, and the investigation into its circumstances continues.
